page.title: 06A typical day for Shirley
page.content: I am eleven years old and I live in Balornock,Glasgow.I attend Knockburn Primary School and a typical Wednesday for me would be like the one I spent on{May 15th 1985.}I got up at 7.15am and had a bowl of Weetabix and glass of milk for breakfast.I got washed and dressed and left for school at 8.35am. I walked to school on my own but met my friends when I arrived.We played "Impossible Ball" until the bell rang at 9.00am.I spent the day in school where we had lessons in maths,English, geography and gym.At 3.30pm school finished and I walked home.I watched television until tea-time when I had my favourite-chips!After tea I did my homework and then put on my uniform to go to Guides.I went for my friend and we went to Guides together.We were there until 9.30pm playing games and badge work.I went to bed at 11.00pm.
